member.name: T:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView
member.summary: The WinForms Embedded View Control allows you to embed a OpenFin Web view within a Windows Forms application.

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.OpenfinWindow
member.summary: The OpenFin Window embedded as part of this control.

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.OpenfinApplication
member.summary: The OpenFin Application that owns the OpenFin Window embedded as part of this control.

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.OpenfinRuntime
member.summary: The OpenFin Runtime Instance.

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.IsReady
member.summary: Is The Embedded View ready

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.OnReady
member.summary: Event will be raised when the OpenFin Window has loaded the content and has rendered.

member.name: E:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Ready
member.summary: Event will be raised when the OpenFin Window has loaded the content and has rendered.

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.OnForcedClosed
member.summary: Event will be raised when the OpenFin Window has been closed by means other than the Close method (WM_DESTROY for example)

member.name: E:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.ForceClosed
member.summary: Event will be raised when the OpenFin Window has been closed by means other than the Close method (WM_DESTROY for example)

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.OnNavigationRejected
member.summary: Event will be raised if content navigation rules have determined that the requested URL is not valid.

member.name: E:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.NavigationRejected
member.summary: Event will be raised if content navigation rules have determined that the requested URL is not valid.

member.name: P:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.AutoScale
member.summary: Controls if the Embedded View resizes with its parent container

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.#ctor
member.summary: A New EmbeddedView Control

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Initialize(Openfin.Desktop.RuntimeOptions,Openfin.Desktop.ApplicationOptions)
member.summary: Provide the application options, this will create an OpenFin application and use the Main Window as the Embedded View.
member.param: Application options for the new OpenFin Application to be created

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Initialize(Openfin.Desktop.RuntimeOptions,Openfin.Desktop.Application,Openfin.Desktop.WindowOptions)
member.summary: Provide the application instance and WindowOptions, this will create an OpenFin Window in a per application shared GPU process
member.param: OpenFin Application that will share the GPU Process with this window.
Window Options for the new OpenFin Window to be created

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Initialize(Openfin.Desktop.RuntimeOptions,Openfin.Desktop.Window)
member.summary: Provide the OpenFin Window object, this will embed the existing Window.

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Reinitialize
member.summary: Reinitializes a previosly embedded view after a runtime, application, or render crash.

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Close
member.summary: Closes the Embedded View

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Embed
member.summary: Embed the OpenFin Window to the current control

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.SetOpenfinEventHanders
member.summary: Adds the Openfin event handlers before Embedding occurs

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.RemoveOpenfinEventHandlers
member.summary: Removes the Openfin event handlers during EmbeddedView reset

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.SetFormEventHandlers
member.summary: Adds the form event handlers after Embedding has occurred

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.RemoveFormEventHandlers
member.summary: Removes the form event handlers during EmbeddedView reset

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.SetParentControlsEventHandlers
member.summary: Sets event handlers for events in the control hierarchy after embedding
member.remarks: This method is not thread-safe and must only be called from the UI thread.

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.RemoveParentControlsEventHandlers
member.summary: Removes event handlers for events in the control hierarchy during EmbeddedView reset
member.remarks: This method is not thread-safe and must only be called from the UI thread.

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.ResizeTo(System.Drawing.Size)
member.summary: Resize the Embedded Window to a given size

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: Override the WndProc speccifically to check if we received WM_DESTROY messages

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of the resources used by the EmbeddedView.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Openfin.WinForm.EmbeddedView.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Override DialogKey events to prevent tabbing through the Winforms control when the EmbeddedView is focused

member.summary: The Embedded control has changed in size

member.summary: The Embedded control visibility has changed
